column2: BRIEF-American Realty Investors Q1 Loss Per Share $0.06 May 15 (Reuters) - American Realty Investors Inc: * AMERICAN REALTY INVESTORS, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * QTRLY RENTAL AND OTHER PROPERTY REVENUES WERE $31.1 MILLION, DOWN $0.7 MILLION, COMPARED TO PRIOR PERIOD REVENUES OF $31.8 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
